mapper.select: SELECT roomCode, rDate, startTime, endTime, sDate, eDate FROM( SELECT ROOM_CODE roomCode, substr(START_DATE, 1, 10) rDate, substr(START_DATE, 12) startTime, substr(END_DATE, 12) endTime, START_DATE sDate, END_DATE eDate FROM ROOM WHERE ROOM_CODE = #{roomCode} AND ROOM_ISSHOW = 'N' ) WHERE rDate = #{date}
